/* ProductPlan.showProductInOutPlan */
SELECT A.inOutSeq, A.inOutDt, A.prodCd, A.qty, A.houseCd, A.unitPrice, A.remark, A.compCd, B.compNm, C.houseNm, D.prodNm, ABS(A.qty * A.unitPrice) "supplyPrice", CASE WHEN A.qty < 0 THEN "out" ELSE "in" END "inOut" FROM ( SELECT * FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYN = 'Y' AND planYN = 'Y' AND prodCd != 0 AND inOutSeq = #{inOutSeq} ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblCompany WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) B ON B.compCd = A.compCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblHouse WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) C ON C.houseCd = A.houseCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd
